name: Aerodynamic Cat Simulator
description:
Aerodynamic Cat Simulator has a pretty simple concept: hit the correct keys to the beat in order to stay on the table.

You are a cat sitting on one end of a table trying to knock down a vase on the other end. The only problem is: there is a giant fan blocking your path. There also happens to be a VERY hungry house dog waiting under the table to eat you.

As you are sitting on the table, the fan will send gusts of wind toward you! As the gusts of wind approach your cat, you must press whatever key is on screen in order to become  AERODYNAMIC  enough to stay on the table.

By Jace Clowdus and Alanna Jimenez
